Richard Kline https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Kline 0 Richard Kline (born April 29, 1944) is an American actor and television director. He is best known for his role of Larry Dallas on the ABC sitcom Three's Company. Richard_Kline ( born April_29_,_1944 ) is an_American_actor_and_television_director . He is_best_known for his_role of Larry_Dallas on the_ABC_sitcom Three 's_Company .
